content: You will next receive a multiple-choice question, each with five options: A, B, C, D, and E respectively. Please provide your answer as a single letter option (your response should contain only one letter as the answer and no other text).

Question: Where do most people turn to get information on their phones?
Options: A. internet B. book C. online D. google E. manual

The majority of people in the world today turn to the internet for obtaining information on their phones. This is because it is the most accessible, comprehensive, and up-to-date source of information available on the web. Therefore, the answer to the question is “A. internet”.

Question: Where do most people turn to get information on their phones?
Options: A. manual B. google C. online D. book E. internet
因为这个问题是询问人们获取手机信息的主要来源，所以正确答案是E. internet。人们现在更多地转向互联网来获取手机上的信息，因为互联网是一个最全面、最新和最便捷的信息来源。而书籍、手册、在线和书本等选项虽然也提供信息，但它们通常不如互联网全面和及时。
